title: A treatise of the right way fro[m] danger of sinne & vengeance in this wicked world, vnto godly wealth and saluation in Christe. Made by Th. Leuer, and now newly augmented. Seene and allowed, according to the order appointed.
author: Lever, Thomas, 1521-1577.
publisher: Printed by Henrie Bynneman for George Byshop,
notes: Running title reads: The right way from danger of sinne.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
